section.p: supports the following standard metrics for monitoring servers and networks. These metrics usually do not require specific settings. The metrics are grouped by metrics types. Each metrics type references a set of related metrics.

section.title: cpu.yaml
section.p: Metrics on CPU usage, e.g. the percentage of time the CPU is idle when no I/O requests are in progress, or the percentage of time the CPU is used at system level or user level.

section.title: disk.yaml
section.p: Metrics on disk space, e.g. the percentage of disk space that is used on a device, or the total amount of disk space aggregated across all the disks on a particular node.

section.title: load.yaml
section.p: Metrics on the average system load over different periods (e.g. 1 minute, 5 minutes, or 15 minutes).

section.title: memory.yaml
section.p: Metrics on memory usage, e.g. the number of megabytes of total memory or free memory, or the percentage of free swap memory.

section.title: network.yaml
section.p: Metrics on the network, e.g. the number of network bytes received or sent per second, or the number of network errors on incoming or outgoing network traffic per second.
